name: Guinea-Pig
description: Guinea Pig is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass a variety of energetic levels for the rabbit. Your main purpose in this game is to collect tablets in each level. After you collect all the tablets on the level, opens the door, passing through which you will be taken to the next level. Be careful on your way there are various obstacles, such as poisoned mushrooms and other dangerous traps. Help the brave hero survive and escape this horrible lab, think through each step and then you will succeed. Go ahead!
